meanings.definition: The lower part or section of something.
meanings.sent1: The underpart of the tree trunk was covered in moss.
meanings.sent2: She found a hidden note tucked underpart of the bookshelf.
meanings.sent3: The underpart of the cake was surprisingly the most delicious.
meanings.sent4: His kindness was the underpart of his tough exterior.
meanings.sent5: The underpart of the mountain was shrouded in mist, hiding its true size.

meanings.definition: The underside or bottom part of an object.
meanings.sent1: The cat hid underpart of the bed during the thunderstorm.
meanings.sent2: The boat's underpart was painted a bright red color.
meanings.sent3: The underpart of the cloud looked like a fluffy pillow.
meanings.sent4: She discovered a secret compartment in the underpart of the drawer.
meanings.sent5: The underpart of the iceberg was massive, unseen beneath the water's surface.
